articles.author: ancient origins
articles.title: Ancient DNA Reveals Reason for High Multiple Sclerosis Rates in Europe - Ancient Origins
articles.description: Researchers have created the world\'s largest ancient human gene bank by analyzing the bones and teeth of almost 5,000 humans who lived across Western Europe and Asia up to 34,000 years ago.
articles.content:
Researchers have created the world's largest ancient human gene bank by analyzing the bones and teeth of almost 5,000 humans who lived across Western Europe and Asia up to 34,000 years ago.
